SEARCH
Package photos24

Class AlbumController

java.lang.Object
photos24.AlbumController
public class AlbumController extends Object
Controller for handling album operations in the Photos24 application.

      private boolean isPictureInAlbum(Album album, Picture picture)
      Checks if a picture is in a specified album.
      Parameters:
      album - The album to check.
      picture - The picture to look for.
      Returns:
      True if the picture is in the album, false otherwise.

    • askForAlbumCaption

      private String askForAlbumCaption()
      Asks for an album caption via a dialog.
      Returns:
      The entered album caption or null if none entered.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
